item.title: DeLorean Time Circuits
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description:
This is a semi-serious rendition of the story behind the making of this project â€”
a replica of the Time Circuits from Back to the Future, turned into a talking alarm clock.

Aside from actual time travel (which may or may not be possible depending on your time zone, ISP, and your ability to construct a flux capacitor), it works beautifully as a nostalgic gadget, delivering iconic quotes from the film.
